A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: To be honest I have seen this movie twice now and been a hard core star wars fan. I have read a lot of the legion books and canon books. Watch the cartoons and all the movies. The first time seeing this I would of rated it a 2 out of 5 because I was confused and felt odd after leaving. Now seeing it twice a lot of it makes sense why they did the story the way they did it... There is some parts where filming was not great and parts of the story I did not like. But the music\, most of the filming and most of the story after seeing it twice I enjoyed. So I will give it a 4.5 out of 5 stars. I would tell people to keep a open mind with the story and if you don't like it the first time give it a second chance.
